text: Sorel Etrog, CM (August 29, 1933 - February 26, 2014) was a Romanian-born Canadian artist, writer and philosopher. He is best known for his work as a sculptor. In 1966, works by Etrog, Alex Colville and Yves Gaucher represented Canada at the Venice Biennale. He died from prostate cancer in Toronto. He was aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Sorel Etrog at Gallery Moos Toronto * "Etrog", Artnet * Sorel Etrog at the Tate Gallery Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Ontario Category:Romanian philosophers Category:Canadian painters Category:Canadian sculptors Category:Canadian philosophers
title: Sorel Etrog
